scenario_1.persona_desc: A systems engineer who is experienced in modeling behavior using activities and interactions in August (Modeling SysML Activities in GENESYS) and September (Modeling SysML Interactions in GENESYS). This month, the systems engineer will be writing about how behavior is modeled using states in GENESYS. The systems engineer has a background in computer science or computational mathematics and has encountered difficulties in modeling behavior using states in the past. The systems engineer is looking for a clear and concise explanation of how states are modeled in SysML and GENESYS, as well as examples of how states and modes are used to model behavior in the context of the systems engineer's specific field of interest.

responses.thought: I will choose the option that gives me the most money, which is $400 in both scenarios. Since both options give me the same amount, I will choose the option that gives the other person more money as well. Therefore, I will choose Right.
